hero.subtitle: Software, Database & APi Developer
hero.description: A passionate developer with over 3 years of experience in database development and web pages. In the workplace, I have acquired key interpersonal skills such as effective communication, problem-solving, adaptability, and teamwork, all essential for project success and team management. I have experience in database development, web applications, and frontend design with a minimalist/modern style.
hero.me: Outside of coding, I enjoy classical music and a good coffee. I believe that a good work-life balance makes the difference.

experiencia.title: Argentine Army - Volunteer Soldier
experiencia.jobDescription: During my time in the Argentine Army, I acquired key interpersonal skills such as effective communication, problem-solving, adaptability, and teamwork, all essential for project success and team management.
experiencia.techStack: I worked with technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Nuxt, Vue, PHP, and Laravel. Also i have adquired strong expertise in databases like MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, and PostgreSQL.
